description: This file defines the EcsVolume class, a subclass of AwsResource, representing an ECS volume with methods to generate and compare volume definitions.

classes.name: EcsVolume
classes.description: Represents an ECS volume resource with configuration options and methods to generate and verify volume definitions.

methods.name: get_volume_definition
methods.description: Constructs and returns a dictionary representing the ECS volume configuration based on the instance attributes.

methods.name: volume_definition_up_to_date
methods.description: Checks if the provided volume definition dictionary matches the current instance's configuration.
